## UnboxState type

Utility type for inferring state shape from [StateContainer](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.statecontainer.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type UnboxState<Container extends StateContainer<any, any>> = Container extends StateContainer<infer T, any> ? T : never;
```
